reviews.review_msg: The course itself is pretty outdated (bioinfomatics in 2000s) and not very interesting, its basically cmpt 307 with a bio component. Kay spends too much time on details about genetic algorithm that you will never use again. Dont get your hopes up, but at least theres no surprises in exam and cheat sheet is allowed.
Prepare to learn the topics by reading the textbook and watching other online lectures.
